thread.title: Press release: Twins-Braves Spring Training March 22, 2024, game canceled due to inclement weather
thread.title_full: Press release: Twins-Braves Spring Training March 22, 2024, game canceled due to inclement weather

title: Press release: Twins-Braves Spring Training March 22, 2024, game canceled due to inclement weather
text: Twins-Braves Spring Training game canceled due to inclement weather Fans are encouraged to visit twins.com/spring for detailed ticket information FORT MYERS, FL – The Minnesota Twins have announced that today’s (Friday, March 22) Spring Training game against the Atlanta Braves at Lee Health Sports Complex has been canceled due to inclement weather and will not be made up. Fans holding tickets purchased directly from the Minnesota Twins to today’s canceled Spring Training game have the following options: - Spring Training Season Ticket Holders: Season Ticket Holders will automatically receive a refund via the original method of payment. - Group Tickets: Group ticket buyers will be contacted directly by their sales representative. - Pick 5 Pack & Single Game Tickets: Pick 5 Pack and single-game ticket buyers holding tickets for today’s (Friday, March 22) game will automatically receive a refund via the original method of payment. Fans holding tickets that have been purchased through a secondary ticket reseller must consult that reseller for more information. Complimentary tickets are not eligible for a refund. Fans are encouraged to visit [twins.com/spring](https://www.mlb.com/twins/spring-training) or call 1-800-33-TWINS for additional details. Tickets Available Group and single-game tickets for the remainder of the Twins’ 2024 Spring Training home schedule at Lee Health Sports Complex in Ft. Myers, FL are available via [twins.com](https://www.mlb.com/twins/tickets/single-game-tickets), by calling 612-33-TWINS or 1-800-33-TWINS, or in-person at the Hammond Stadium Box Office.
